description:
Super excited to talk about some idol groups and the impact they had on me with @UtanoPandora and @TakanashiKiara ! Happy to spend time with these ladies!

VReverie

💋 Stream etiquette and guidelines 🔪
1. Please be respectful to one another.
2. No spoilers allowed, absolutely NO backseating. Only help if I personally ask for it. I do not and will not respond well to unsolicited advice.
3. Spam/harassment is not allowed or acceptable.
4. No self-advertisement or promotion.
5. Please stay on topic during the stream.
6. Don't call me obasan/dad or bully me.
7. Do not talk about or mention about other streamers without me mentioning them first.
8. No doxxing or revealing of personal information (of the streamer, community members, or yourself).

You will receive 3 warnings before getting timed out or banned by a moderator.

VREVERIE'S CATALYST 💋
